[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat

abbrev omnimath1031_answer : ℕ := sorry
def phi_factorial (n : ℕ) : ℕ := 
  (List.range (n + 1)).filter (fun k => k ≠ 0 ∧ Nat.gcd k n = 1) |>.prod

theorem omnimath1031 : 
  (∑ n ∈ (Finset.range 51).filter (fun n => 2 ≤ n ∧ Nat.gcd n 50 = 1), phi_factorial n) % 50 = omnimath1031_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: n=3, phi_factorial=2, running_total=2
n=7, phi_factorial=720, running_total=722
